TEXT.TITLE: KANSAS GAS AND ELECTRIC CO <KGE> FEBRUARY NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 13 cts vs 5 cts Net 5,568,319 vs 2,968,437 Rev 36.5 mln vs 34.0 mln 12 months Shr 1.60 dlrs vs 1.79 dlrs Net 72,865,101 vs 85,198,853 Rev 521.3 mln vs 420.3 mln NOTE: Twelve months includes the cumulative effect of a change in accounting methods for accruing unbilled revenues of 11.4 mln dlrs, or 28 cts per share.
